original_text:
In that day they will come to you,
    from Assyria and the cities of Egypt,
and from Egypt to the River,
    from sea to sea and from mountain to mountain.
korean_text: 그 날에는 앗수르에서 애굽 성읍들에까지, 애굽에서 강까지, 이 바다에서 저 바다까지, 이 산에서 저 산까지의 사람들이 네게로 돌아올 것이나

sentences.original_text: In that day they will come to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그 날에 그들이 너에게 올 것이다

sentences.original_text: from Assyria and the cities of Egypt
and from Egypt to the River
from sea to sea and from mountain to mountain
